front.title: Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links (TRILL) over an MPLS PSN (Packet Switched Network)

abstract.t: This informational document describes ways to interconnect TRILL RBridges over WAN connections by using MPLS Pseudo Wire (PW) or Virtual Private LAN Service (VPLS) with existing TRILL and MPLS standards. It also describes the combination of RBridge and MPLS to provide a hierarchical scalable L2VPN.
